about_the_game:
✦Trial Version✦

In the demo version, you can meet 8 endings and 6 characters.

The game has some differences from the full version, so please enjoy the different reactions!

The reason there is no END2 is that the ending that is implemented only in the production version has been omitted from this trial version. Please look forward to the full version!

✦Story✦

This is the magical world of Majirisia.

You are a summoner and you have summoned a demon.

You tell it your name in order to make a contract with it, but the demon won't tell you its name.

To "regain its true form," the ambition of Debirun, the creator of the name you have given it, you must gather magical power.

Summon all the inhabitants of Magirisia to gather magical power and plunge them into a whirlpool of terror!

✦Game System

In this adventure game, you and Debirun summon unique characters and convert their "emotional aura" into magical power to collect them.

More than 24 characters can be summoned in total!

Each character has three phases in which the player must choose one of two options for what he or she will do to arouse the other character's emotions. However, you do not choose blindly. Use the devil's special ability, "Evil Eye Search," to peek into your opponent's mind.

By reading the mind, you will naturally find the correct choice, and sometimes you may even catch a glimpse of an unexpected side of the person...? Make full use of the Debirun's abilities to make the situation better.

There are also many endings to collect. If you choose the wrong option, you may end up in an instant fallout END! Make use of save & load to collect endings efficiently. If you collect them all...?

Game Features

・Diverse Endings & End Cards

The game offers a variety of endings and end cards, which are the most collectible elements of the game. If you collect them all...?

The ending of the game can be an instant dropout, so use the magic of save and load to proceed. Save often before making choices!

Tap the characters to enjoy their reactions, or play the randomized games and timing games.

The backgrounds and characters are fully animated. You know it's a bad choice...but you can't help but want to go see how they react! You can do this for the sake of collecting endings, right?

About Demo

You can play the story for the "Day 0".

*Please feel free to post videos and still images using captured game works, regardless of whether you are an individual or a company, and whether or not you are monetizing your work. Please use the hashtag #DevilConnection

*The extraction, secondary use, modification, or alteration of in-game materials is strictly prohibited.

*The creator of the game will not be held responsible for any problems or trouble that may occur when playing the game. Please use at your own risk.
